Posted By: NeedADispenserHere (8/29/2011 11:56:42 PM)

posts.post_content:
For this block it was basically meant to be some sort of Threshold until end of turn.  
But it can still have some use since you don't have to remove the top seven cards, therefore by playing this card you might get some goodies into your graveyard and can keep them if you have others to remove instead.  
For Threshold decks and also for other uses in general you'll much rather play [Glimpse The Unthinkable](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Glimpse The Unthinkable), though.
posts.html:
